aboutBody: Hey!!! I'm Gustavo Ferreira, a 19 years Front-End developer. I develop modern, responsive,acessible and high quality interfaces. I currently live in Lisbon. See more about my projects and don't forget to visit my social medias :)

competenceCards.name: HTML
competenceCards.body: HTML is the standard markup language for creating Web pages.

competenceCards.name: Css
competenceCards.body: CSS is the language that is used to style a Web page.

competenceCards.name: React
competenceCards.body: React is the most popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

competenceCards.name: Flutter
competenceCards.body: Flutter is an open-source UI software development kit created by Google. It is used to develop cross-platform applications for Android, iOS, and the web from a single codebase

competenceCards.name: Vue.js
competenceCards.body: Vue.js is an open-source model–view–viewmodel front end JavaScript framework for building user interfaces and single-page applications.

competenceCards.name: Svelte
competenceCards.body: Svelte is an open source javascript framework created to build fast and performatic interfaces

competenceCards.name: Javascript
competenceCards.body: Javascript is a programming language that is one of the core technologies of the web, alongside HTML and CSS. 98% of websites use JavaScript on the client side for webpages

competenceCards.name: Git
competenceCards.body: Git is a distributed version control system: tracking changes in any set of files, usually used for coordinating work among programmers collaboratively developing source code during software development
